Statute.Title: Northern Canada Power Commission (Share Issuance and Sale Authorization)
Statute.OtherLangTitle: (Émission et la vente des actions de la Commission d’énergie du Nord canadien, Loi autorisant l’)

General.Text: Repeal and consequential, ss. 13 to 22 (see R.S., c. 7 (4th Supp.), ss. 1 to 9)

CIF.Text: CIF, 1988, c. 12 in force 05.05.88 see SI/88‑84
CIF, 1992, c. 39 ss. 49 and 50 in force 15.06.93 see SI/93‑88 see also s. 51
CIF, 2002, c. 10, s. 179 in force on assent 30.04.2002
